name: Binky MCMXCIX: The Labyrinthe
description:
Binky has found themselves inside the wonderous Labyrinthe...

What treasures are to be found within its walls?

controls: arrow keys to move, Z to interact/advance text

BINKY MCMXCIX was found in a pile of rubble outside city limits. It is not known to be connected to the canon BINKY games.

After much debate and anticipation, we have finally translated the game into a format playable on human computers.

Please enjoy!

(full credits ingame)
